automatic_ordering.reasoning: A careful review of the session data reveals that most sessions are combat dialogs triggered during a turn. However, a few sessions include an extra condition—in their 'how_to_trigger' string—they are only activated when S_Player_Jaheira is dead. This extra condition appears in three sessions: 'AD_Combat_DockGuard_Melee_JaheiraDied', 'AD_Combat_EntranceGuards_Halfling_Melee_JaheiraDied', and 'AD_Combat_BarricadeGuards_Melee_Dwarf_JaheiraDied'. Because of their 'JaheiraDied' requirement, they are logically tied to the moment after the player character Jaheira dies. In contrast, their counterparts without the 'JaheiraDied' suffix are triggered in the normal course when Jaheira is still alive. Thus, within any single playthrough the two versions of a given encounter are mutually exclusive—they cannot both occur because the condition of Jaheira’s life status is binary. In addition, the sessions that require Jaheira’s death must occur only after the event where Jaheira dies (even though the death event itself is not represented as a session here, it serves as a prerequisite for these dialogs). No ordering constraints are evident among the other sessions, as they are simply triggered during a combat turn without further causal dependencies. Therefore, the only ordering constraints to note are the ones where the Jaheira-died condition must occur after Jaheira’s death, and the mutually exclusive pairs between the normal and _JaheiraDied versions.

AD_Combat_BarricadeGuards_Melee_Dwarf_0.speaker: Harper Darragh
AD_Combat_BarricadeGuards_Melee_Dwarf_0.text: I'll cut you down to size!

AD_Combat_HarperQuartermaster_0.speaker: Quartermaster Talli
AD_Combat_HarperQuartermaster_0.text: Get back in the trash pile where you belong!

AD_Combat_DockGuard_Melee_JaheiraDied_0.speaker: Harper Hangfar
AD_Combat_DockGuard_Melee_JaheiraDied_0.text: This is for what you did to Jaheira!

AD_Combat_EntranceGuards_Halfling_Melee_.speaker: Harper Callie
AD_Combat_EntranceGuards_Halfling_Melee_.text: I'll not let you take anyone else from me!

AD_Combat_DockGuard_Ranger_0.speaker: Harper Naysa
AD_Combat_DockGuard_Ranger_0.text: Got a blade with your name on it!
